Menguntungkan, Alasan Pebisnis Berjualan lewat Toko Online
07 Nov 2019, 12:29 by Sarah Ervina Dara Siyahailatua, Yayuk Widiyarti
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Para pebisnis mulai menjajakan dagangannya di platform jual beli daring. Tak hanya pakaian saja, namun juga berbagai kebutuhan pangan, seperti kopi dan bumbu masakan pun ditawarkan lewat internet. Apa alasan mereka melakukannya?
Pemilik toko kopi lokal Kopi Ujang, John Chendra menjelaskan berbagai keuntungan bisa diraih dari berjualan online. Misalnya, ia merasa dimudahkan untuk melakukan pemasaran. Terlebih dengan kemajuan teknologi dan ketergantungan banyak orang dengan gawai yang dimiliki.
“Karena sekarang sudah masuk dunia digital, kita harus bisa mengejar pasar dengan ikut masuk di sana. Otomatis memudahkan pelanggan yang ingin beli juga,” katanya dalam acara media gathering Tokopedia di Makassar pada 7 November 2019.
Keuntungan lain bisa didapat berupa masuknya pemesanan tanpa mengganggu aktivitas penjual. Misalnya, saat malam hari saat seseorang harusnya tidur, Chendra mengatakan bahwa ia tidak lagi diganggu untuk mengangkat telepon dari pelanggan.
“Posisi admin hanya dipegang oleh saya dan istri. Kalau ada yang order lewat telepon, kadang larut malam. Tapi semenjak gabung dengan platform online, pelanggan order lewat sana, kita tinggal kirim saja,” jelasnya.
Chendra juga mengatakan jika berjualan melalui platform online memiliki peluang kelarisan yang lebih besar. Alasannya pun sederhana, yakni promo yang sering diberikan oleh platform online sehingga menguntungkannya maupun pembeli.
“Sekarang kalau kita jual dengan harga 100 ribu di toko offline, saat ditawarkan di online harganya sama tapi ada promo cashback atau potongan harga dari platform, pasti pelanggan belinya lewat toko online. Jadi peluang untuk dibeli lebih besar,” ungkapnya.

Profitable, Reasons for Businesses Selling through Online Stores
Nov 7 2019, 12:29 AM by Sarah Ervina Dara Siyahailatua, Yayuk Widiyarti
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Businessmen have begun selling their wares on the online trading platform. Not only clothing, but also a variety of food needs, such as coffee and cooking spices were offered via the internet. What is the reason they did it?
Local coffee shop owner Kopi Ujang, John Chendra explained the various benefits can be achieved from selling online. For example, he felt it was easy to do marketing. Especially with technological advances and the dependence of many people with devices that are owned.
"Now that we have entered the digital world, we must be able to catch up with the market by entering there. Automatically makes it easy for customers who want to buy too, "he said at the Tokopedia media gathering in Makassar on November 7, 2019.
Another advantage can be obtained in the form of order entry without interrupting the seller's activities. For example, at night when someone should be asleep, Chendra said that he was no longer bothered to pick up the phone from customers.
"The admin position is only held by my wife and me. If someone orders by phone, sometimes late at night. But since joining the online platform, customers order through there, we just need to send it, "he explained.
Chendra also said that selling through online platforms has greater inheritance opportunities. The reason is also simple, namely promos that are often given by online platforms so that it benefits both buyers and buyers.
"Now if we sell it at 100,000 in an offline store, when it is offered online the price is the same but there is a cashback promo or a discounted price from the platform, customers will definitely buy it through the online store. So the opportunity to buy is bigger, "he said.
